item.title: Auto publish blog using GitHub Actions
item.description: Hugo is the fastest open-source static site generators. It helps me to focus more on writing rather than tinkering with the tools. But there’s another step after writing, it’s to publish the blog. To automate the publishing, I’m using GitHub Actions.

item.title: Hello world! ðŸ‘‹
item.description:
Welcome to my blog! I’ll be writing mostly about software enginering and technology.

As usual, software engineers all over the world start with saying hello!
